subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Lakers never trailed the Spurs in Game 4 of the Western Conference finals, but they never gave themselves much of a cushion, either, and the game came down to a dozen or so dramatic plays down the stretch.
snippet: The Lakers never trailed the Spurs in Game 4 of the Western Conference finals, but they never gave themselves much of a cushion, either, and the game came down to a dozen or so dramatic plays down the stretch.
